10200.description: Port for voice broadcasts. Suggested default: 10200.
10200.label: Default port

/data.description: Choose a Share for data. Eg: create a Share called piper-data for this purpose alone.
/data.label: Data Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Piper with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the same UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

Piper.description:
Home Assistant Wyoming protocol server for piper text to speech system.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/rhasspy/wyoming-piper, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
